Name: Powder Heal
Description: Once during your turn, you may heal 20 damage from each of your pokemon

Name: Fragrance Trap
Description: If this Pokemon is in the Active Spot, once during your turn, you may switch in 1 of your opponent's Benched Basic Pokemon to the Active Spot

Name: Counterattack
Description: If this Pokemon is in the Active Spot and is damaged by an attack from your opponent's Pokemon, do 20 damage to the Attacking Pokemon

Name: Shell Armor
Description: This Pokemon takes -10 damage from attacks.

Name: Water Shuriken
Description: Once during your turn, you may do 20 damage to 1 of your opponent's Pokemon.

Name: Volt Charge
Description: Once during your turn, you may take a Electric Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to this Pokemon.

Name: Shadowy Spellbind
Description: As long as this Pokemon in the Active Spot, your opponent can't use any Supporter cards from their hand.

Name: Sleep Pendulum
Description: Once during your turn, you may flip a coin. If heads, your opponent's Active Pokemon is now Asleep.

Name: Psy Shadow
Description: Once during your turn, you may take a Psychic Energy from your Energy Zone and attach it to the Psychic Pokemon in the Active Spot.

Name: Gas Leak
Description: Once during your turn, if this Pokemon is in the Active Spot, you may make your opponent's Active Pokemon Poisoned.

Name: Hard Coat
Description: This Pokemon takes -20 damage from attacks.

Name: Drive Off
Description: Once during your turn, you may switch out your opponent's Active Pokemon to the Bench. (Your opponent chooses the new Active Pokemon.)

Name: Data Scan
Description: Once during your turn, you may look at the top of your deck.
